verses.verse: <S%H8416>Praise<s%> <S%H1747>waits<s%> for <S%H430>you<s%>, O God, in <S%H6726>Sion<s%>: and unto you shall the <S%H5088>vow<s%> be <S%H7999>performed<s%>.
O you that <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H8605>prayer<s%>, unto you shall all <S%H1320>flesh<s%> <S%H935>come<s%>.
<S%H1697>Iniquities<s%> <S%H1396>prevail<s%> against <S%H6588>me<s%>: as for our transgressions, you shall purge them <S%H3722>away<s%>.

<S%H835>Blessed<s%> is the man whom you <S%H977>choose<s%>, and cause to <S%H7126>approach<s%> unto <S%H7931>you<s%>, that he may live in your <S%H2691>courts<s%>: we shall be <S%H7646>satisfied<s%> with the <S%H2898>goodness<s%> of your <S%H1004>house<s%>, even of your <S%H6918>holy<s%> <S%H1964>temple<s%>.

By terrible <S%H3372>things<s%> in <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> will you <S%H6030>answer<s%> <S%H430>us<s%>, O God of our <S%H3468>salvation<s%>; who are the <S%H4009>confidence<s%> of all the <S%H7099>ends<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and of them that are afar <S%H7350>off<s%> upon the <S%H3220>sea<s%>:
Which by his <S%H3581>strength<s%> sets <S%H3559>fast<s%> the <S%H2022>mountains<s%>; being <S%H247>girded<s%> with <S%H1369>power<s%>:
Which <S%H7623>stills<s%> the <S%H7588>noise<s%> of the <S%H3220>seas<s%>, the <S%H7588>noise<s%> of their <S%H1530>waves<s%>, and the <S%H1995>tumult<s%> of the <S%H3816>people<s%>.

They also that <S%H3427>live<s%> in the outermost <S%H7099>parts<s%> are <S%H3372>afraid<s%> at your <S%H226>signs<s%>: you make the <S%H4161>outgoings<s%> of the <S%H1242>morning<s%> and <S%H6153>evening<s%> to <S%H7442>rejoice<s%>.

You <S%H6485>visit<s%> the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and <S%H7783>water<s%> <S%H7227>it<s%>: you greatly <S%H6238>enrich<s%> it with the <S%H6388>river<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>, which is <S%H4390>full<s%> of <S%H4325>water<s%>: you <S%H3559>prepare<s%> them <S%H1715>corn<s%>, when you have so provided for <S%H3559>it<s%>.

You <S%H7301>water<s%> the <S%H8525>ridges<s%> there <S%H7301>abundantly<s%>: you <S%H5181>settle<s%> the <S%H1417>furrows<s%> <S%H4127>there<s%>: you make it soft with <S%H7241>showers<s%>: you <S%H1288>bless<s%> the springing <S%H6780>there<s%>.
You <S%H5849>crown<s%> the <S%H8141>year<s%> with your <S%H2896>goodness<s%>; and your <S%H4570>paths<s%> <S%H7491>drop<s%> <S%H1880>fatness<s%>.
They <S%H7491>drop<s%> upon the <S%H4999>pastures<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>: and the little <S%H1389>hills<s%> <S%H1524>rejoice<s%> on every <S%H2296>side<s%>.

The <S%H3733>pastures<s%> are <S%H3847>clothed<s%> with <S%H6629>flocks<s%>; the <S%H6010>valleys<s%> also are covered <S%H5848>over<s%> with <S%H1250>corn<s%>; they shout for <S%H7321>joy<s%>, they also <S%H7891>sing<s%>.
